unit

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • unit.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HealerUnit, JediUnit, RangeUnit, TankUnit

    public abstract class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is the super class for all Unit types. It has attackRange, damage, health, moveRange, movesLeft, iconImage(String), username, and canAttack.
    Author:
    Kal
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
